{{Infobox National football team | Name = {{flagicon|LIB}} [[Lebanon]] | Badge = | FIFA Trigramme = LIB | FIFA Rank = | FIFA max = | FIFA max date = | FIFA min = | FIFA min date = | pattern_la1=|pattern_b1=|pattern_ra1=| leftarm1=C00000|body1=C00000|rightarm1=C00000|shorts1=FFFFFF|socks1=C00000| pattern_la2=|pattern_b2=_thinredsides|pattern_ra2=| leftarm2=FFFFFF|body2=FFFFFF|rightarm2=FFFFFF|shorts2=FFFFFF|socks2=FFFFFF| | | Nickname = [[Cedrus libani|The Cedars]] | Association = [[Federation Libanaise de Football Association|Federation Libanaise de
Football Association]] | Confederation = [[Asian Football Confederation|AFC]] and [[West Asian Football Federation|WAFF]] | Coach = {{flagicon|LIB}} [[Samir Saad]] | Most caps = | Top scorer = | Home Stadium = [[Camille Chamoun Sports City Stadium]] and [[Saida International Stadium]] | Regional name = [[Asian Games]] | Regional cup apps = 1 | Regional cup best = Group Stage, 1998 }} The '''Lebanon national under-23 football team''' represents the [[Republic of Lebanon]] in the under-23 olympic or youth football competitions. Their official nickname is '''The Cedars'''. The team is controlled by the [[Federation Libanaise de Football Association]] (FLFA) which is a member of the [[FIFA]], the [[Asian Football Confederation]] (AFC) and also the [[West Asian Football Federation]] (WAFF). The team has never qualified for the [[Olympic Games]]. They only have a one time participation in the [[1998 Asian Games]]. ==External Links== * [http://www.fifa.com/associations/association=lib/index.html#gender=m Lebanon at FIFA website] * [http://www.the-afc.com/en/about-afc/member-associations/816-member-associations/25-federation-libanaise-de-football-association Lebanon at AFC website] {{Football in Lebanon}} {{International Football}} {{AFC teams}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Lebanon National Football Team}} [[Category:Asian national association football teams]] [[Category:Lebanon national football team| ]] [[ms:Pasukan bola sepak kebangsaan Lubnan bawah-23]] [[pl:Reprezentacja Libanu U-23 w piÅce noÅ¼nej]]
